definition: A term commonly employed to refer to the act of distributing or making available a particular item, such as a publication, product, or resource, to the public or a specific audience. It typically denotes the release or issuance of something, often in a printed or published form, for public consumption or purchase.

examples.german: Die neue Ausgabe der Zeitschrift ist endlich da.
examples.english: The new issue of the magazine is finally here.

examples.german: Die Ausgabe des Buches wurde überarbeitet.
examples.english: The edition of the book has been revised.

examples.german: Die Ausgabe der Zeitung ist bereits vergriffen.
examples.english: The edition of the newspaper is already sold out.

examples.german: Die Ausgabe der Software enthält viele neue Funktionen.
examples.english: The release of the software includes many new features.

examples.german: Die Ausgabe des Geldes erfolgt in bar.
examples.english: The disbursement of the money is made in cash.
